id.description: A grant identifier unique to this grant and CBSD allowing peer SASs to identify the grant.

terminated.description: Indicates whether the grant is currently terminated or not.

operationParam.description: When present, includes operation parameters of the successfully requested grant.

requestedOperationParam.description: Same as operationParam.If only this field is present (and not the operationParam field), there is no active grant associated with the request.

grantExpireTime.description: Indicates the UTC time when the grant expires.
